archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0486
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a transitioning customer, since I am on subscription, I would like to make sure that each subscription only starts when I start using. For instance my broadband may work immediately at the end of the transition CX journey as I already have it in the legacy. But the TV or VOIP that I have ordered, should be charged only when I am first able to use the service (i.e. STB or CPE received and the pre-requisites are done).

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
